title: Dancers of the Dawn
description: Deep in the desert a storm is brewing. The first in a slow burning YA romantasy.Under the blazing sun, an elite troupe of dancers are trained to harness their magic. They are the queen’s most formidable assassins. Aasira has one of the rarest talents – for she is a flame-wielder. Feared by all and envied by some, she uses her power to execute enemies of the crown.Aasira’s greatest wish is to serve her queen. But on the eve of her graduation, with tensions rising among the dancers and secrets stirring in the shifting sand dunes, she begins to question whether she was truly born to kill…An epic story about truth, loyalty and betrayal.
author: Zulekhá Afzal
